para: In this section, you can search for the relevant user using keywords or their email in the search box below and take the necessary actions, such as assigning admin privileges or deleting the user.
note: Note: Granting admin privileges allows the user to modify all system settings, and user deletions are permanent and cannot be undone, making these actions highly sensitive.
error: Allocated or pending parking slots available!
error_user_deletion: You cannot delete your own account.
error_user_status_change: You cannot make changes to your own account.

fire1.title: Are you sure?
fire1.text: Do you want to delete this user? You won't be able to revert this!

fire2.title: Can not Delete!
fire2.text: You cannot delete your own account.

fire5.title: Are you sure?
fire5.text: Do you want to change the user status? You won't be able to revert this!

fire6.title: Unsuccessful!
fire6.text: You cannot make changes to your own account.

fire7.title: Unsuccessful!
fire7.text: User status can not be performed, try again later.
